Title: Prohibits the use of materially deceptive media in political communications when the information content provider that creates the communication has actual knowledge and without disclosing such use
Summary: Prohibits the use of materially deceptive media in political communications when the information content provider that creates the communication has actual knowledge that such communication is materially deceptive without disclosing such use.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to prohibiting the knowing use of materially deceptive media in political communications without disclosing such use
